page.title: Harrie de Groot | Freelance Software Developer · Heerenveen Friesland Netherlands
page.description: Freelance Software Engineer with a background in Artificial Intelligence. Hands-on Software Architect with 15+ years' experience. Available for full-stack, front-end and back-end projects.
page.keywords: Freelance, Software, Heerenveen, Friesland, Netherlands, ICT, ZZP, Software Engineer, Software Architect, Software Developer, programmer, coder, full-stack, back-end, front-end, 15+ years' experience, MSc., A.I., AI, Artificial Intelligence, C#, .NET, TypeScript, Angular

about.title: about
about.quote1: All-round **Software Engineer** with a background in **Artificial Intelligence**. Started as a professional game developer in 2007. **Games** became **mobile apps**. Over time, this evolved into building complex cross-platform **web applications**.
about.quote2: Hands-on **Software Architect** for **full-stack**, **back-end** and **front-end** projects. Experienced with a wide variety of platforms and technologies. Capable of quickly learning and utilizing new technologies. Specialised in **C# .NET** and **Angular Typescript**, but not attached to a single framework or programming language. Committed to delivering valuable and **high-quality** solutions.
about.quote3: I'm a **domotics** enthousiast, **cycling** addict and father of three who likes contributing to the community through **open source** projects and by sharing knowledge and expertise to help others.

cards.title: Web applications
cards.content: I can help you **design** and **build** a web application to meet your unique business needs. Whether you need a web application from scratch, integration with APIs, or an enterprise cloud platform, I have the **skills** and **experience** to deliver **high-quality solutions** no matter the complexity.

cards.title: System Integrations
cards.content: Need to **integrate different systems** or technologies, such as web applications and databases or third-party APIs? Connect internal systems, build an **API** for your app or integrate with external applications, I **connect** them **seamlessly** and **efficiently** using protocols like REST, SOAP, GraphQL, WebHooks, MessageBus and Socket Connections.

cards.title: Custom software
cards.content: Do you have **special needs** that are not met by off-the-shelf software? I developed many **domain-specific solutions** like business software extensions, low-code frameworks, dashboards for data analysis and much more. Whether you need a **simple tool** or a **complex, integrated system**, I can provide the software to meet your custom requirements.

cards.title: Domotics · IoT
cards.content: Are your devices and systems connected to the **Internet of Things**? I have created **domotics** solutions like a Bluetooth integration for BluFi setup on the Raspberry PI, drivers for smart-home devices or a smart Hub for devices communicating over MQTT. I can link **physical devices** with your applications, allowing you to create seamless, **connected experiences** for your users.

cards.title: Mobile apps
cards.content: Want to reach your customers on the go? I have multiple years of experience with both **hybrid cross-platform** and **native** mobile app development for iOS and Android. I also worked on the core of the mobile App building platforms AppMachine and Impress.ly. Lets work together to determine the **best approach** to build an app for your target audience.

cards.title: Miscellaneous
cards.content: Looking to **optimize** your operations, create **innovative experiences**, or solve a **unique problem**? Feel free to contact me to discuss your project and see how I can help you succeed. Some examples from other fields I worked on in the past are: A.I. Algorithms for warehouse optimization, a low-code platform for business apps, lots of games, a Social Media Inbox, APIs for domain registration and **many other projects**.

personality.title: personality
personality.analytical_text: Skilled at finding **solutions** in complex domains by approaching them from multiple perspectives and **thinking out-of-the-box**
personality.generalist_text: Using my expertise and **broad knowledge** across many domains and technologies to **detect patterns** and see the big picture
personality.organised_text: Stay focused on driving value for the business by managing priorities and make future-proof decisions to ensure long-term success
personality.responsible_text: Can make difficult choices and deliver on commitments as a reliable team member who contributes to the organization's success
personality.studious_text: Always embracing new technologies and apply them in appropriate use cases to deliver innovative solutions
personality.critical_text: Critical thinker who always aims for the best and approaches challenges with an open mind to deliver exceptional results
personality.quote: Mastering a new tool is not the hard part, it's selecting the best tool for the job
